author: [ember.ha...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/118257407105291107710/)
title: Wrong damage calculation for the final attack

comments.body:
By hitting undo and attacking again and again I was able to locate the problem: it's Artifact Creature - Golen 3/3 token. 

Whenever creatures are attacking without those Golems, the calculation is right. But if one or more Golems are attacking, calculation is always wrong.
comments.author: [ember.ha...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/118257407105291107710/)

content:
_From [ember.ha...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/118257407105291107710/) on October 21, 2013 23:40:13_

Opponent: no lands, no creatures, no cards in play, 1 life left.

Player: lots of creatures, lots of tokens, some enchantments. Final attack for 62 total damage.

Opponent's life calculation after attack: -8. How come? :)
Should be -61.

Game table at the moment right after the attack: http://s22.postimg.org/kas3tcl75/game.png Game.log:

CREATED ON 2013/10/21 17:40:16
